description: President Aria is the http://anidb.net/ch7786 [Aria Company]`s mascot, a male Aqua breed feline (common traits include larger size compared to Earth breeds, and human-level intelligence). He is smart enough to understand human speech. He was an alley cat before taken in by http://anidb.net/ch1289 [Grandma] 20 years ago, and has been the company`s mascot ever since.
name: Aria Pokoteng
